epfl.lia.logist.config
Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
  epfl.lia.logist.config.ConfigurationManager

public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object

The ConfigurationManager class manages the access to configuration data stored in configuration files. It provides methods for loading either a default configuration, if anyone is provided, or a named configuration object.

Copy constructor of the class. This method stores the file object for later use.

Method Detail

getConfigurationByName

public Configuration getConfigurationByName(java.lang.String name)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Get a configuration object by its name. This configuration object is built from descriptors filled from the configuration file. The list of configurations is searched by name. If found, then, a configuration object is returned, else, the method throws an error

Parameters:
name - the name of the configuration to load
Returns:
a configuration object holding simulation descriptors,
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
Configuration

getConfigurationByDefault

public Configuration getConfigurationByDefault()
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
Return a configuration previously loaded from the configuration file. The configuration is the one specified by the default attribute of the simulation tag of the configuration file. The configuration must exist or an exception is thrown

Returns:
a configuration object holding simulation descriptors
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
Configuration
